name: Gelato Fragola
description:
What could be better than Strawberry Gelato? Try this easy and oh so delicious and super easy recipe and decide for yourself.

The creamy part:
(Flavorah) Sweet cream, (VTA) Fresh Milk, and (FA) Cream Fresh

The strawberry part:
TFA Strawberry ripe, (Inawera) Strawberry Sisha and (RF SC) Strawberry Gelato.

A little (FA) Lime Thaity to lift the strawberries and give some depth to the mixture.
The mix is delicious as is but....

You can add WS-5, WS-23 or Kolada at taste for a fresh ice cold gelato.
Maybe I'll do the same in summer.

3 day to steep...
author: besejuiced
